title: N172 Old Judge Amos Rusie HOF SGC 2.5
author: Joshheckathorn

posts.post_title: N172 Old Judge Amos Rusie HOF SGC 2.5
posts.post_content:
Card is sold N172 Old Judge Amos Rusie SGC 2.5 Price is 3,500 OBO paypal F/F, add 3% for goods. Shipping with signature and insurance included. 
A very rare card that doesn't come up for sale often, and a tough player to cross off of a HOF collection. Would like to sell here before taking to Ebay. I couldn't get the photos to upload so I attached a link to my flickr account. 

[url]https://www.flickr.com/photos/188295891@N05/albums[/url]
